messages: Ah, liquid regret. Exactly how I prefer my beverages to taste.
Hmm... Can I still drink this? Lemme give this a shot.
Drat! No body, no stomach, no taste!
Brad: Huh? Did that glass fall over by itself?
Girlfriend: Nooooo! My wine! How will I ever cope with my sadness now?
Brad: Here, I'll take you out... Don't cry! Drowning your sorrows in alcohol isn't the way.
Nothing happens. Brad and Girlfriend pass each other without a single glance.
Nothing given, nothing gained. They never saw each other again.
